containers.name: nginx
args: rm -f /etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf && printf 'server { listen 8080; location / { root /usr/share/nginx/html; index index.html; } }' > /etc/nginx/conf.d/custom.conf && exec nginx -g "daemon off;"

containers.name: curl-sidecar
args: while :; do curl -s http://127.0.0.1:8080 >/dev/null; sleep 5; done
